channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:50 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 17:50 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
